mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video_comment (commentno, comment, writedate, modifydate, deletecomment, video_no, member_id) VALUES (#{commentNo}, #{comment}, #{writeDate}, #{modifyDate}, #{deleteComment}, #{videoNo}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT commentno commentNo, comment comment, writedate writeDate, modifydate modifyDate, deletecomment deleteComment, video_no videoNo, member_id memberId FROM video_comment WHERE video_no = #{videoNo} and deleted = FALSE ORDER BY video_no DESC

SELECT commentno commentNo, comment comment, writedate writeDate, modifydate modifyDate, deletecomment deleteComment, video_no videoNo, member_id memberId FROM video_comment WHERE video_no = #{videoNo} and deleted = FALSE ORDER BY video_no DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{count}
